column1: Beechbone was a notably tall and handsome Ent.  On [[3 March]] {{TA
column3: Great}}</ref> he was caught in a burning spray sent up by [[Saruman]] from the beneath the [[Ring of Isengard]], but his fiery end brought his fellow [[Ents]] to the peak of their destructive anger.<ref>{{TT

:An unnamed Ent survives being set alight by extinguishing the flames in the floods of the River [[Isen]].
